PreToolUse.command: cd /home/user/data-center-tycoon && CMD=$(echo $TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.command // empty') && if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then bash .claude/hooks/pre-commit-review.sh 2>&1; fi

PostToolUse.command: cd /home/user/data-center-tycoon && FILE=$(echo $TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.file_path // empty') && if [ -n "$FILE" ] && echo "$FILE" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx)$'; then npx eslint --no-warn-ignored "$FILE" 2>&1 | tail -20; fi
cd /home/user/data-center-tycoon && CMD=$(echo $TOOL_INPUT | jq -r '.command // empty') && if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then bash .claude/hooks/post-commit-doc-check.sh 2>&1; fi

SessionStart.command: cd /home/user/data-center-tycoon && echo '=== Lint Check ===' && npm run lint 2>&1 | tail -20 && echo '=== TypeScript Check ===' && npx tsc -b --noEmit 2>&1 | tail -20
